      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract Actor ActorFactory.Type.create(Army armyAllegiance)
      Polymorphic method that will bind to the specific create() method for the actual named type (e.g.
      static Actor ActorFactory.createActorRandomSelection(Army armyAllegiance)
      Method that will select one of the available Actor types, create an object of that type and return a reference-to that object.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static javafx.scene.control.TableView<Actor> Actor.createTable()
      createTable is static to allow Army to define a table without having any Actor objects present.
